artbyamyanderson: I love you and I enjoy your honesty 🙌
bobbileebrooks: I get it more than I let on to anyone. I might voice my feelings but generally I know that people prefer gossip, positive energy and all that stuff. I cant give that to anyone right now. My thoughts are my own and I somehow sense that is where they should stay. I'm alone and it doesn't feel good becoming increasingly harder everyday to even venture out. Getting older doesn't feel great because I have done nothing that I'm proud of, something that has sustained a positive impact on my life and the lives of others. Time is going too quickly and I feel the things that I want to do and places I want to see are impossible now. But I get up everyday and I hope and feel hopeful for that day to be different, better than yesterday and sometimes I feel the possibility of things are so close but I never seem to get there. I'm tired and I feel like I have been fighting my whole life making the wrong decisions and the people that were once so close really weren't close at all. You will feel better and you are far from old, in fact you are a beautiful woman.. depression is the worst. It isolates you and we move slowly trying to sift through the muck. I'm sorry that you feel badly and we don't know each other but I do know how you feel. Keep moving and keep the friends that are real to you. But remember, this can all change for you. It's fucking hard work but grab unto the good and let go of the bad......
